name: Aozora Under Girls: Karsome Irony
summary: "Aozora Under Girls - Karsome Irony" is a unique VR rhythm game (RhythmGame) based on the operating modes of various popular rhythm games on the market. The game has been licensed by SQUARE ENIX's well-known IP "Girls under the Blue Sky", so we have created a special customized "Aozora Under Girls - Karsome...
